# LinkUp â€” Full Index

> https://techlinkup.xyz

LinkUp is a community-driven platform for discovering tech events across Nigeria. It aggregates conferences, meetups, workshops, hackathons, and networking events submitted by Nigeria's tech community, covering all 36 states and the FCT.

## About

LinkUp was built to solve the problem of scattered, hard-to-find tech event information in Nigeria. The platform allows anyone to submit an event for free. Submitted events are reviewed by admins before being made publicly visible.

## Audience

- Software developers and engineers
- Designers (UI/UX, product)
- Product managers and founders
- Data scientists and AI/ML practitioners
- Students and early-career tech professionals
- Event organizers looking to reach Nigeria's tech community

## Event Categories

- AI/ML (Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning)
- Web Development (frontend, backend, fullstack)
- Mobile Development (iOS, Android, cross-platform)
- Cloud Computing (AWS, GCP, Azure, DevOps)
- Cybersecurity
- Data Science and Analytics
- Blockchain and Web3
- UI/UX Design
- Product Management
- Startup and Entrepreneurship
- General Tech / Networking

## Event Types

- In-person: Physical venue events across Nigerian cities
- Online: Virtual events accessible from anywhere
- Hybrid (In-person & Online): Both attendance modes available

## Geographic Coverage

All 36 Nigerian states and the Federal Capital Territory. Major tech hubs include:
- Lagos (Ikeja, Lagos Island, Victoria Island, Lekki)
- Abuja (FCT)
- Port Harcourt, Rivers State
- Ibadan, Oyo State
- Enugu, Enugu State
- Kano, Kano State
- Benin City, Edo State
- Owerri, Imo State
- Uyo, Akwa Ibom State

## Pages

- [Home](https://techlinkup.xyz): Browse and filter all upcoming tech events in Nigeria
- [Submit Event](https://techlinkup.xyz/submit-event): Submit a tech event to be listed on the platform
- [Track Submissions](https://techlinkup.xyz/my-submissions): Check the status of a submitted event using a tracking ID
- [About](https://techlinkup.xyz/about): About LinkUp and how it works
- [Contact](https://techlinkup.xyz/contact): Contact the LinkUp team
- [Privacy Policy](https://techlinkup.xyz/privacy-policy)
- [Terms of Use](https://techlinkup.xyz/terms-of-use)

## Individual Event Pages

Each approved event has a dedicated page:
https://techlinkup.xyz/events/[id]

Event pages include:
- Full event title
- Start and end date
- Time
- Venue / location (with city and state)
- Event type (in-person, online, hybrid)
- Category tags
- Full description
- Price (free or paid with amount)
- Link to the official event website or registration page

## Sitemap

A full list of all indexed event pages is available at:
https://techlinkup.xyz/sitemap.xml

## Submission and Review Process

1. Organizers submit events via the public submission form
2. Admins review each submission for relevance and accuracy
3. Approved events are published and immediately visible on the homepage
4. Rejected events receive feedback via email so organizers can resubmit

## Content Policy

All listed events are real, Nigeria-based tech community events. Events are reviewed before being made publicly visible. LinkUp does not endorse or take responsibility for individual events.

## Contact

Contact form: https://techlinkup.xyz/contact
